thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 24 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Czech car plant TPCA raising wages 16.4 pct over next two years -unions

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Czech car plant TPCA raising wages 16.4 pct over next two years -unions
text:
PRAGUE, Jan 24 (Reuters) - Czech car factory TPCA, run by Toyota and Peugeot-Citroen, will raise wages by an average 16.4 percent over the next two years, the plantâ€™s unions said on Wednesday.
The export-oriented economy is driven largely by the car sector and has been growing at a strong clip in recent years, helping push unemployment to a two-decade low and boosting wages.
The average wage grew by a nominal 6.8 percent in the third quarter last year. (Reporting by Robert Muller; Editing by Jason Hovet)
